entry.title: irf87/prices-scraper: Lightweight API & scraper for e-commerce on low-power devices, compatible with ARM
entry.content: Lightweight API & scraper for e-commerce on low-power devices, compatible with ARM

entry.title: OosukeRen/SvelteAndNWJSForWindowsXP: This is a template for creating easily software for Windows XP with NW.js 15.4 (Latest possible version of NWjs that can successfully start on XP, which isn't the publicly known - 14.7). And Sveltekit (because it's pretty lightweight, easy to prototype and use and doesn't take up a loo of drive memory).
entry.content: This is a template for creating easily software for Windows XP with NW.js 15.4 (Latest possible version of NWjs that can successfully start on XP, which isn't the publicly known - 14.7). And Sveltekit (because it's pretty lightweight, easy to prototype and use and doesn't take up a loo of drive memory).

entry.title: letmaker/liko: Liko is a simple, fast, and lightweight H5 render framework by typescript. Liko is a high-performance rendering engine based on WebGPU, designed for AI. Liko can be used for games, H5 applications, and interactive interactions.

entry.title: Yanny24211/pixel-draw: This is a lightweight and interactive pixel drawing board build with Vite (React). The app allows users to create pixel art by clicking across a customizable grid. It's designed for simplicity, speed, and ease of use — perfect for quick sketches or experimenting with pixel designs.
entry.content: This is a lightweight and interactive pixel drawing board build with Vite (React). The app allows users to create pixel art by clicking across a customizable grid. It's designed for simplicity, speed, and ease of use — perfect for quick sketches or experimenting with pixel designs.
